Initializer# init(upstream:_:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
init(
    upstream: Upstream,
    _ map: @escaping (Upstream.Failure) -> Failure
)
```

[`init(upstream: Upstream, transform: (Upstream.Failure) -> Failure)`](/documentation/combine/publishers/maperror/init(upstream:transform:))Creates a publisher that converts any failure from the upstream publisher into a new error.
